info.title: boundaries-io
info.description:
US Zipcode, County, City, and State Boundaries API:

A simple & very fast API that will allow you to integrate multiple GeoJson US boundaries results into your apps and systems.

This API is designed to be used programatically for optimal performance.  When using the MashApe UI for queries expect significant latency issues on large result sets!

get.description: Get US State,Zipcode, or City boundaries in GeoJson Formats.  The MashAPI UI cannot handle large results(we default to 30 zipcode limit), this API is meant to be used programatically.  Thanks.  Copy & paste results: http://geojsonlint.com for a quick view.

parameters.name: and
parameters.description: Perform and "AND"(true),  "OR"(false) query on request parameters...DEFAULT IS FALSE.

parameters.name: county
parameters.description: Query by multiple counties. (for example 'Worcester County' use 'Worcester')

parameters.name: includepostal
parameters.description: Include postal or unique zipcode Points  in the geoJson response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of zipcode to include in the resulting geoJson. This is an optional parameter.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Query by multiple states(for example "DC,VA").  please execute programmatically. the Mashape UI cannot handle the amount of zipcodes returned and will hang.
